visualizationConfigs.vQuery: MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.assessmentReportName = {assessmentReportName}  and n.kpiId={kpiId} with distinct max(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN DISTINCT n.jiraKey as `Issue key`,toInteger(round(toFloat(n.predictedValue))) as `Predicted Number Of Days To Complete`

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.assessmentReportName = {assessmentReportName}  and n.kpiId={kpiId} with distinct max(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN DISTINCT n.jiraKey as `Issue key`,n.predictedValue as `Completed Within Current Sprint`

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.assessmentReportName = {assessmentReportName}  and n.kpiId={kpiId} with distinct max(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN DISTINCT n.predictedValue as `Completed Within Current Sprint`, count(n) as count

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.assessmentReportName = {assessmentReportName}  and n.kpiId={kpiId} with distinct max(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN DISTINCT n.resultField as predictedField, toInteger(sum(round(toFloat(n.predictedValue)))) as `Total estimated story points`

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.assessmentReportName = {assessmentReportName}  and n.kpiId={kpiId} with distinct max(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN DISTINCT n.Issuekey as `Issue key`,toInteger(round(toFloat(n.predictedValue))) as `Predicted Story Point` limit 5

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.assessmentReportName = {assessmentReportName}  and n.kpiId={kpiId} with distinct max(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN n.Issuekey as `Issue key`,toInteger(round(toFloat(n.predictedValue))) as `Predicted Story Point`
